mapper.select: SELECT t.*,course.name course_name FROM (SELECT question.*,`user`.name user_name FROM question LEFT JOIN `user` ON question.account = user.account WHERE question.status > 0 ) t LEFT JOIN course ON t.course_id = course.id WHERE course_id IN (select course_id from teacher_course where teacher_course.account =#{account}) order by t.up_time desc

SELECT t.*,course.name course_name FROM (SELECT question.*,`user`.name user_name FROM question LEFT JOIN `user` ON question.account = user.account WHERE question.status > 0 and question.course_id = #{courseId} ) t LEFT JOIN course ON t.course_id = course.id

SELECT t.*,course.name course_name FROM (SELECT question.*,`user`.name user_name FROM question LEFT JOIN `user` ON question.account = user.account WHERE question.status = 0 and question.course_id = #{courseId} ) t LEFT JOIN course ON t.course_id = course.id

SELECT t.*,course.name course_name FROM (SELECT question.*,`user`.name user_name FROM question LEFT JOIN `user` ON question.account = user.account WHERE question.status > 0 and question.id = #{questionId} ) t LEFT JOIN course ON t.course_id = course.id

SELECT t.*,course.name course_name FROM (SELECT question.*,`user`.name user_name FROM question LEFT JOIN `user` ON question.account = user.account WHERE question.status > 0 ) t LEFT JOIN course ON t.course_id = course.id WHERE course_id IN (select course_id from student_course where student_course.account =#{account}) order by t.up_time desc

SELECT * from(SELECT t.*,course.name course_name FROM (SELECT question.*,`user`.name user_name FROM question LEFT JOIN `user` ON question.account = user.account WHERE question.status > 0 ) t LEFT JOIN course ON t.course_id = course.id) m WHERE CONCAT(m.title,m.detail,m.user_name,m.course_name) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
